title: Big Tech earnings show digital ads market not out of the woods
text: After a challenging 2022 in which advertising-dependent companies faced shrinking budgets and cratering stock prices, fourth-quarter results this week from Alphabet, Meta Platforms and Snap showed they were not yet in the clear.

title: Cavalcade of Earnings: AAPL, AMZN, GOOGL & More
text: Apple, Amazon and Alphabet all reported quarterly numbers today -- and that's just the A's.

title: Jim Cramer says Meta Platforms' latest quarter is why he stuck with the stock
text: Jim Cramer said Facebook-parent Meta Platforms' most recent quarter is why investors shouldn't always sell stocks that get hammered.

title: Meta Platforms (META) Q4 Earnings Beat, Revenues Dip Y/Y
text: Meta Platforms' (META) fourth-quarter 2022 performance suffers from lower ad spending, challenging macroeconomic conditions, adverse forex and stiff competition.

title: Tech Stocks Surge As Meta Soars On Earnings; Pivotal Jobs Report On Deck
text: The stock market ended mixed Thursday, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq composite surging as Meta Platforms soared more than 23%. The post Tech Stocks Surge As Meta Soars On Earnings; Pivotal Jobs Report On Deck appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

title: Meta shares soar lifting Zuckerberg's net worth
text: Shares for Meta are spearheading a tech rally and lifting the CEO's net worth by $10.86B in one day.

title: Why Are Tech Stocks Up Today?
text: After a turbulent period in 2022, circumstances appear much more fortuitous in the new year for the technology sector. With the Federal Reserve possibly signaling a less-aggressive framework moving forward, the benchmark S&P 500 bounced conspicuously higher.

title: Meta Platforms: Fantastic Results For A Fantastic Business
text: The management team at Meta Platforms announced financial results covering the final quarter of the company's 2022 fiscal year. Shares of the business roared higher in response to better-than-expected sales, cost-cutting initiatives, and a major share buyback program.

title: Meta stock could jump 30% as Mark Zuckerberg sobers up on his metaverse ambitions and focuses on other initiatives, Gene Munster says
text: "It's as if Zuckerberg is just saying what investors want to hear," Munster said. "What that tells me is that Zuckerberg gets it and that's important."

title: ETFs Set to Surge on Solid Meta Q4 Results
text: Though the social media giant reported its third consecutive quarterly drop in revenues, it provided an upbeat revenue forecast signaling a rebound in demand for digital ads after months of weak sales.

title: Meta shares nearly doubled to $180 since Jim Cramer apologized to viewers
text: The company's rally prompted a gleeful response among Cramer's critics.

title: Meta Platforms Is Back
text: 2022 was one of the worst years in recent history for Meta Platforms Inc. ( META , Financial) with the company losing more than half of its market value in a year that was characterized by falling stock prices. Part of the decline may have been justified due to the company's huge business shift, but other investors have held that the seloff was overdone.

title: U.S. FTC denies Meta petition to recuse Khan from Within Unlimited review
text: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) rejected a petition filed by Facebook-parent Meta seeking the recusal of Chair Lina Khan from participating in any decision concerning the review of Meta's proposed merger with virtual reality app maker Within Unlimited.

title: Why Meta Platforms Stock Was Surging Today
text: The company is slashing costs and targeting a return to profitability.

title: Meta Platforms price target raised to $220 from $145 by Oppenheimer
text: Analysts at Oppenheimer raised their price target on Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:FB) to $220 per share from $145, after the company's solid fourth-quarter earnings saw a revenue beat, trimmed costs and strengthening products.       Oppenheimer which has an “Outperform” rating on Meta, acknowledged the firm's materially reduced expense projections and the “modest upside” in 4Q revenue.

title: 3 Growth Stocks That Any GARP Investor Will Love
text: The search for GARP – growth at a reasonable price – is on. For investors looking for the best-quality growth stocks which are now trading at a reasonable price, the list is certainly longer than it was during the high-flying days of 2021.

title: Why Meta and Align Are Sending the Nasdaq Soaring Thursday
text: Markets looked poised to keep their upward momentum after the Fed's latest decision.

title: Compared to Estimates, Meta Platforms (META) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
text: Although the revenue and EPS for Meta Platforms (META) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2022, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

title: Tech-heavy Nasdaq leads stocks higher after Fed announcement, Meta results
text: 9.35am: Meta's results send tech stocks higher US stocks largely continued to make gains on Thursday as the Fed's latest interest rate hike decision boosted sentiment, amid rate hikes from the Bank of England and European Central Bank and ahead of corporate earnings from tech heavyweights this afternoon including Amazon, Alphabet, and Apple. The Nasdaq Composite was leading the gains when the market opened, up 238 points or 2% at 12,065 points, with the S&P 500 adding 36 points or 0.9% at 4,156 points.

title: Meta Stock On Pace For Best Day In 10 Years
text: Meta shares surged 20% after the company reported earnings, hitting an eight-month high.

title: Meta shares rocket 20% on solid earnings: Analyst sees 'enticing' valuation
text: Meta Platforms saw a slew of analyst upgrades as shares rose nearly 20% off the backs of a better-than-anticipated earnings report and optimistic commentary.

title: Dow Jones, S&P 500, Nasdaq set to open mostly higher on Fed announcement, Meta results
text: 6.30am: Apple, Amazon and Alphabet to report today Wall Street is expected to open mixed but mostly higher after the US Federal Reserve turned less hawkish on interest rates and as Facebook and Instagram owner Meta delivered quarterly revenue that beat expectations and announced measures aimed at boosting shareholder value.  While futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average declined 0.1% in Thursday pre-market trading, those for the broader S&P 500 index rose 0.5% and contracts for the Nasdaq-100 gained 1.4%.

title: Meta's ‘meteoric' shift could power stock to its best day since 2013
text: Meta Platforms Inc. changed its narrative in a big way this week, and that's resonating on Wall Street.

title: Meta Stock Soars on Efficiency Drive. Growth is the Next Challenge.
text: “We can't just treat everything like it's hyper growth,” Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told analysts.

title: Meta surges on cost cut, buyback plans; lifts mega-cap stocks
text: Shares of Meta Platforms Inc soared nearly 20% in premarket trading on Thursday as the Facebook parent wooed investors with plans to rein on costs and a new $40 billion share buyback.

title: 2 Cheap Nasdaq Stocks Crushing the Market in 2023 That Could Be Magnificent Buys Right Now
text: These tech stocks have gotten off to a flying start this year, and may spring a positive surprise following a woeful 2022.

title: U.S. stock futures point to further gains as Meta results, Powell press conference provide cheer
text: U.S. stock futures were pointing to a stronger start Thursday, buoyed by upbeat results from Facebook parent Meta Platforms as well as the after-glow from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's press conference.
